title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: As he got out and locked the car door he was hit by the sharp tang of sea air, so familiar to him as a kid. He'd grown up only a few minutes along the road from here in a poky two-bedroom ex-council flat on Portobello High Street. He bristled with memories, the rubbery skin of a dead jellyfish on the beach, ice cream melting on his hand, his mum licking it off and laughing.
